scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/chrome && script/generate_manifest && cp -r src/statics/* dist/chrome && browserify src/normal/index.js -o dist/chrome/main.js && browserify src/common/content/content.js -o dist/chrome/content.js
scripts.build-xpi: mkdir -p dist/firefox && TARGET=firefox script/generate_manifest && cp -r src/statics/* dist/firefox && browserify src/normal/index.js -o dist/firefox/main.js && browserify src/common/content/content.js -o dist/firefox/content.js && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../../build/firefox.xpi * && cd ../../
